title: Track intrusion causing delays on North-South Line

updates.text: Updated: Normal train service has resumed. Free bus and free bus bridging are still available between Jurong East and Yew Tee stations.
Train services between JurongEast and YewTee have resumed now. Pls expect additional 10mins traveling time between Jurong East and Yew Tee.
[NSL] Update : Train services between Jurong East and Yew Tee are now running slowly.Free bus and bus bridging are still available.
[NSL]: Update: No train service between Jurong East and YewTee in both directions.
[NSL]: Update: Free bus and bus bridging service is still available between Bukit Gombak and Yew Tee stations.
[NSL]: No train service between BukitGombak and YewTee in both directions.The person intrudes to the track again.
Update: Trains are running normally now. Free bus service between Bukit Gombak and Yew Tee has ceased.
[NSL]: Update: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between Bukit Gombak and Yew Tee due to track intrusion.
[NSL]: Update: Free bus service is activated between Bukit Gombak and Yew Tee stations.
[NSL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between YewTee and Jurong East due to track intrusion.
